issue.title: [C++] Support equality comparison between COO and CSX sparse tensors in SparseTensorEquals
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4222](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4222). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently SparseTensorEquals always returns false when it gets COO and CSX sparse tensors.

It should support comparing the items in the sparse tensors.
